parameter.name: tokenOrApiKey
parameter.label: Token or API Key
parameter.description: API Key to access the official solaredge API. If using Private API this must be fills with Spring Security Token (Check Browser Cookies when logged into website)

parameter.name: solarId
parameter.label: Solar ID
parameter.description: The ID to identify the solarplant at SolarEdge.

parameter.name: meterInstalled
parameter.label: Meter Installed
parameter.description: If your setup contains a modbus meter, please activate this, to get more detailed data.

parameter.name: usePrivateApi
parameter.label: Private API
parameter.description: Private API allows to avoid the limit of 300 API calls per day but is less documented and therefore less stable. If no meter is available you cannot use the private API, it does not provide live data for this kind of setup.

parameter.name: liveDataPollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Interval in which live data is polled from SolarEdge (in minutes). If not using private API this should not be less than 10 minutes.

parameter.name: aggregateDataPollingInterval
parameter.label: Polling Interval
parameter.description: Interval in which aggregate data is polled from SolarEdge (in minutes). If not using private API this must not be less than 60 minutes.
